title: The Mountie's Werewolf
description: [Siren Classic Erotic Alternative Paranormal Romance, M/M, werewolves, light consensual BDSM, sex toys, HEA] Canadian Mountie Nick Stamos is the lead investigator in a gruesome murder. He’s been collecting evidence all night when he’s pulled off the case by a rival department and relegated to help with research only. He’s then forced to team up with a cop from a different police force, so they can share ideas and information. However, all Nick wants to do is share his new partner’s bed and figure out what mysterious secret he might be hiding.
